channel.title: Micro on Abhishek Kumar
channel.description: Recent content in Micro on Abhishek Kumar

item.title: Micro Projects
item.description: This contains DataScience, MachineLearning, NLP, NeuralNet & RL related Micro Projects & Tasks completed during academic & self-learning period. Contents Machine Learning ML - CO2 Emission Prediction: This project tries to identify the macroeconomic factors that are biggest predictors of global warming i.e. global carbon dioxide emissions using Lasso Regularization Regression. ML - SMS Classifier: This project classifies the SMS as spam vs non-spam through naive bayes.
